website_summaries.verdict: An affordable and space-saving charging station that boasts reliability.
pros: For its low price, this is a reliable charging station that saves space and looks great
The included 2-foot USB cable can plug into your PS4 directly, and the station brings 2 controllers up to full charge in 2.4 to 4 hours
cons: A few customers reported scratches on their controller touchpads after using this station

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for a PS4 with many plugged devices
customer_reviews.text: Got this last year but i think its only appropriate to review this now. I have the PS4 on dock with 3 extra USB ports. I use one of the ps4 ports to connect to the dock. The other is for my external storage harddrive. The 3 USB slots on the dock are used for the VR, Bluetooth Headset and final one is for this controller charger. For someone with 3 controllers this was a must for me since I charge 2 around the same time and 3rd is being used. Plus it looks nice when the controllers are docked in.
customer_reviews.author: Nu!

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Light changes from red to green when charged. Although the light isn’t very bright and is hard to tell what color it is when further away or at a certain angle. I have silicone covers on my controllers that I have to slide back when putting on the charger. Overall, works well.
customer_reviews.author: Tia King

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for. I own several ps4 controllers. Always had an issue trying to keep them all charged up. This takes up very little room on my table and easily charges 2 controllers at the same time. It lights up green when it's charged or red while it's charging. It's light weight and was very easy to assemble. I'm very happy with the Ps4 controller charger, megadream Playstation 4 charging station for the Sony Ps4/Ps4 Pro/Ps4 Slim DualShock Controller!
customer_reviews.author: Nadine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these for my son then after him telling us how much he liked it I bought one for me and hubby. The PS4 controllers fit perfectly and we haven’t had any problems with the charge. It is super convenient, fast, and I’m not looking for cords anymore. It is a great way to keep kids organized too. My son was somehow losing his controllers but now he has a docking station to return them too. His friends thought it was really neat and asked where they could get one. So I’m spreading the word!
customer_reviews.author: BLT

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, But Ruined Controller Charging Ports
customer_reviews.text: I would have loved to give this 5 stars, because it works well and looks good while charging the controllers. But this charging station has ruined the ports on both of my controllers. I can now only plug the controllers in to this charging station and can't plug the actual charging cable directly into the controller's ports anymore. The item has pushed the ports further into the controllers and the charging cable doesn't fit anymore. So when playing and needing to plug in, I can't. If this thing ever stops working, my controllers will be useless.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly surprised at such good quality for low price. Bought a month ago and absolutely no problems. Great gift to get a ps4 fan.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep controllers charged
customer_reviews.text: This charger is pretty great for the fact that I will always have a charged controller when one dies. Having the USB hub on the PS4 helps out so this charger is not taking up a USB port just for charging. The lights are bright enough and change to Red when the controller is charging and once complete it turns to the green color. The quality seems a bit cheap as it is made from plastic but i have had no issue with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this over a year now. I enjoy it. Makes easy work of charging multiple controllers. Only complaints is that its kinda tricky getting it in there but once you get the hang of it, its fine. Do not let that stop you from buying it. No biggie.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: This Is The One!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used a few dual chargers over the years with varying success, some don’t really “dual charge” for instance... well this one does. It’s solid, really solid and stable, the lights are informative as to charging status, it charges quickly and you can safely leave your controller locked in. It’s... perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Now I can charge both my PS4controllers ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Now I can charge both my PS4controllers while I'm asleep, and when I wake up I can game and not worry about battery levels. Just switch out a controller low on juice for one that's already fully charge, and let the other sit and recharge while I continue playing. Best invention ever! Lol.
customer_reviews.author: chann223

customer_reviews.title: Great charger base
customer_reviews.text: High quality, durable charger base. We’ve used this almost daily for about a year with no issues. Easily keeps all our controllers topped off. Easy to attach and remove controllers, and bright charge lights make it easy to see status.
customer_reviews.author: B R

customer_reviews.title: Great for charging multiple controllers while the PS4 is completely shut off.
customer_reviews.text: This charger is perfect if you want to charge multiple controllers. If you connect this to a power outlet with a USB adapter then you can charge two controllers while the PS4 is completely shut off. The best part is that I connected it to a power outlet with an IPod USB adapter and it charges both controllers as advertised in the listing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have accessory for the PS4!
customer_reviews.text: How did I live life as a gamer without this?! If you are on the fence, let me just say this base ensures the controllers stay charged and that they are in the same place every time you site down to play! A must have. I admit I thought it would be flimsy (it is plastic) and the controllers would be difficult to line up, but I've had literally no problems.. the way the plastic is formed, the controllers slot in perfectly every time.
customer_reviews.author: Rich W

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service and product: Great
customer_reviews.text: The set up is very quick and easy. The controllers fit right in because the clear plastic helps guide it. Overall, it's a good controller charger. You won't regret buying this item. My package came late due to snow and bad weather during this winter season. I contacted the seller and they were very nice and extremely helpful. They dealt with the situation immediately and explained to me what had happened. It was USPS that kept many packages because there was no way to ship them out due to bad weather. The customer service was great and the product is a good product. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Isai De Los Angeles

customer_reviews.title: Looks great next to the console
customer_reviews.text: Finally my son can now stop taking my vape and tablet charging cables and charge his controllers with this ! The controllers slide right in with little effort and stay in place (one I had before they fit so loosely that at times they would come out and hit the floor at the slightest touch ) ...the LED will turn red while charging and blue once is fully charged. Looks great next to the console, great quality for such inexpensive item, beyond my expectations for sure !
customer_reviews.author: IR1977

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied, but...
customer_reviews.text: This charging station holds controllers well and charges them fast. In addition, it can be plugged into one of the USB ports on the front of the PlayStation. But I've noticed that it leaves fine marks on the controller's touchpads after only a few days of use. I purchased both of the controllers brand new, so I can be sure they did not come this way. The marks also line up with the edges of the charging holder. It isn't very noticable right now, but it could get worse with more use.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Garbage!!!! Do Not Buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage! This piece of trash broke on me after only a few uses. As you can see in the pictures the metal casing on the charging port broke off...INSIDE THE CONTROLLER!!! Do yourself a favor and buy something better. Cause now I have to return this, and now I have found myself without a charging dock. I bought this so I didn't have to use cables anymore. Well I guess it was a nice thought. I should have bought something better.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Alert: Does not come with an AC cord; only a usb cable. I had an adapter on hand, so it was fine. But if i didn't I would have been unhappy, as the Ps4 does not have a rear usb connect which would have forced me to connect to the front of Ps4 thus degrading overall aesthetic. Looks sleek. Controllers snap in cleanly; they fit snugly in their clip. The plastic of the stand was lightweight so I was concerned how well it would stand/how durable it would be. But it seems to do its job.
customer_reviews.author: Elsord0

customer_reviews.title: No Frills, It Just Works.
customer_reviews.text: Works great and got here quickly. Controller fit is snug and there's not too much worry of it falling out or coming loose if you nudge it. My only complaints are regarding the USB cable included. The cable included is short and the fact that it uses mini USB instead of micro USB for the input is also a little inconvenient. Have a lot of longer Micro USB cables laying around that I can't use with it. However even with that minor gripe, it's a great buy and does everything it says it does. It charges the controllers and keeps them organized. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan R

customer_reviews.title: This charger is from the future
customer_reviews.text: Yo, this thing right here? Top notch. It looks great on my entertainment center and the lights make it look like a fun little robot from the future. Really all the lights tell you is whether each individual controller is charged fully (blue) or not (red). Because of its space aged design, it's sometimes difficult to ascertain whether and when the controller is fully mated to the receptacle when you insert it. I've matriculated the controller unto the charger for the night only to return in the morning to find it wasn't charging because it was improperly seated. I got used to it after a while and now it's second nature.
customer_reviews.author: The Fryman

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed as a PS4 gamer
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product, does exactly what it is intended to. It was a hassle trying to have my controllers charged the old fashioned way, because the light faces away from me and I would have no idea when it's fully charged Because this stand has the indicator to let you know when it's fully charged, there are no more guessing games - and there are two of them. What more could I ask for? 5 stars, easily
customer_reviews.author: Call me Monty...

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping an extra USB port open on your PS4.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the LTD edition gold PS4 slim, and it has only 2 USB ports on the front of the system, I also bought an extra gold controller. So charging both controllers at the same time would've used both ports, so this charger saved one port so I could hook up the external hard drive.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Scratched the touch pads on the controllers
customer_reviews.text: It does charge well and the lights are nice, but it doesn't stand up well with both controllers docked. More importantly, it scratched the touch pad on the PS4 controllers. I'm guessing it is the top plastic part of the charging dock. I have two that were new and both have scratches in the same place. Would not recommended buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a life saver!
customer_reviews.text: This charger was cheap and I love the fact that the end that plugs into the wall or PC is ALSO USB, but the adapter is the more common one (I think it's called USB C?), rather than the flat plug that goes directly into the PS4 controller. This thing is a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Nice & Inexpensive buy- I’d recommend.
customer_reviews.text: These work great. I love it for keeping things nice and clean and organized for my daughter. Green and red lights show when charging is in progress/Done.
customer_reviews.author: Evan1342

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had any problems. But this is for back up just in case his cord goes out. But I did test it when I first received it A year later and it’s still working great, my son uses it everyday since he doesn’t have a cord because it went out. He had two controllers, plays one while the other charges.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wellington

customer_reviews.title: 4 &1/2*'s- Only time will tell but great so far!
customer_reviews.text: Price and assembly is awesome and easy. It looks great too. I am still not sure on using the micro-usb for charging like this. For the most part, it seems to connect ok enough. But it hangs off the micro-usb connection slightly. With it being cantilevered, I do have to wonder if the weight of the controller will eventually damage the port. It is not quick and easy to slide these into the charger but it works. Should also note this is not a quick charger. Aside the above, a great charger for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Odii Gis

customer_reviews.title: Works well and my kids love it. I have 3 kids and they are ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well and my kids love it. I have 3 kids and they are tough. 2 months later it's still working and charging the controllers. For me, that's great. Buy with confidence. It works well. And I like how it clicks in the remotes.
customer_reviews.author: HYoung

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been searching for something to clear up the USB ports on his PlayStation 4 and this was the perfect solution! It glows red while charging and glows blue when its done. Holds 2 controllers strongly and is very nice to look it. We have ours plugged into our computer next to our system but it can be plugged into your PS4 . Target sells something similar for double the price so this is a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Sara V

customer_reviews.title: Dead controllers back from the dead!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I'd found these a year ago. I went through 2 PS4 controllers that just stopped charging using the USB out of nowhere. I bought a replacement that did the same thing after about 6 months. I finally broke down and talked to my tech genius brother who let me know this is a major design flaw in these controllers. When he told me this $10 charging station would bring them back from the dead I thought he was messing with me. But lo and behold it 100% works! All controllers charge fine and back from the dead! If you have a similar problem GET THIS PRODUCT!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kitttylover

customer_reviews.title: Works and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient, looks sleek, and really helps to organize the controllers while you're not using them and keep them charged. I bought it as a gift for my boyfriend and he likes it. I like it so much I might get one for myself also. I was worried at first since it is an off-brand, and not Sony brand, but I have had no issues with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: djYAAAS

customer_reviews.title: Keeps controllers charged and where we can always find them.
customer_reviews.text: Works great - so easy to keep controllers not only charged but safe from gettling lost and/or stepped on. Plugged it into the PS4, made the setting to allow power to the USB in Rest Mode and voila - always charged.
customer_reviews.author: JC13

customer_reviews.title: It works really good, the controllers snap in and out very easily ...
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing negative to say here. It works really good, the controllers snap in and out very easily for charging and it looks cool too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: seems super fragile but i can’t complain for the price
customer_reviews.text: seems super fragile but i can’t complain for the price! just have to take extra care of it. also i had a problem wear nothing would charge my controller. i tried using different cords, buying a new controller, pluging the charger into an outlet as opposed to the ps4, but nothing would work.i took a chance by buying this and now whenever i play am at 3 bars! its stops charging the controller is fully charged too i believe, so you dont have to worry about it frying your controller.
customer_reviews.author: Flu5h

customer_reviews.title: This is a great docking station to charge your PS4 controllers u don’t ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great docking station to charge your PS4 controllers u don’t have to worry a about wires anymore when u have this handy gadget in your home...It even charges faster..u won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Ladysirenny

customer_reviews.title: This never worked right from the time I bought it ...
customer_reviews.text: This never worked right from the time I bought it. The controls never seemed to fit right in the stands and would fall out. Sometimes the lights worked to indicate the charging status and other times it didn't. I felt that the controllers charged with this barely held a charge compared to just charging it with a USB cord. Not a product worth purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Runden

customer_reviews.title: Great for charging controllers
customer_reviews.text: Works great, assembles in seconds. I've been using it for almost a week and it's been working flawlessly. I use the playstation to charge both controllers and I also have a set of playstation wireless headphones that need to be charged as well. With this item I can charge all of them from the playstation so everything stays in one place.
customer_reviews.author: TheAccountant1969

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised! Short cord.
customer_reviews.text: Was a little leary about this purchase. Read about several similar products with mixed reviews. Only a month old at this writing and so far so good. Only draw back is you have to supply your own usb power transformer. An old phone charger will work. A power strip or wall outlet with built in usb slots is your best bet. Also the provided usb cord is pretty short depending on where you plan to place it...it needs to be close, like 2' from the plug, to reach. Not a deal breaker but something to consider.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: One of the charging tabs came off and got stuck ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the charging tabs came off and got stuck to the controller, I was able to put it back on so it still works, just kinda bummed it was a little cheap made. UPDATE: So I realized that since I've gotten this charging station, yes the lights turn on, but I notice that the controllers never actually charge. I don't play my PS4 a lot but when I do, I grab a controller and it is no where near charged. I wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro R.

customer_reviews.title: Go get one if don't have one!! 😀👍🎮🔋
customer_reviews.text: It's awesome!! Love it! Looks nice and controllers sit nice and fit! 👍👌😀🎮🔋🎮 AWESOMENESS nice charger!!
customer_reviews.author: FR3D0

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good but with an issue
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the other charging stations I've used for my PS4 controllers this one is pretty good. It already comes assembled (although I had this for a while and can't remember if I had to snap the base plate in). My issue with it is that if you don't put your controller in the dock properly it won't charge so you have to make sure that red light goes on and your light on the controller in pulsing that's how you'll know its charging. The charging station works well and lasts since I've had mine for 2 years now.
customer_reviews.author: Emily H.

customer_reviews.title: it works great, and helps us keep everything organized
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this for a few months now, it works great, and helps us keep everything organized.
customer_reviews.author: Christoper Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: Beats plugging them into the PS4!
customer_reviews.text: This does the job, and does it well. Why 4 stars? 1) Does not come with a wall adapter. Not a huge deal breaker in this day and age, you probably have dozens of them laying around. 2) the awkward use of a USB Mini B connector. Instead of the more common Micro B... So if you lose the cable or it stops working, you might have to search a bit for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: LeppardQueenTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the boys so we didn't have a bunch of chords all over the place, due to our cat and dogs in the house chewing on them. This has saved space and makes the console look nice and organized. We know where the remotes are always, since they have a spot and we have off brand remotes that work great with this. No problems at all...have had them for quite a few months and still working great....even with kids.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted... And more...
customer_reviews.text: Charges controllers fast and while ps4 is in rest mode. Bonus points for being a nightlight, the darkness in my house is evil ;_;
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: no complaints. It does what it's supposed to do ...
customer_reviews.text: no complaints. It does what it's supposed to do: charge 2 controllers. Toss them on at night, take them off in the morning and they are charged 100%. Whether or not it kills the controller battery is beyond me, but I haven't noticed an issue yet
customer_reviews.author: BigRedJeep

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed. A cheap option to charge ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. A cheap option to charge my controllers that actually works. It is EXACTLY that. I keep mine stowed in a drawer with two controllers on it at all times. I haven't noticed any issues so far in charging or wear and tear. My biggest issue with other more 'used' chord chargers is after a few weeks they must be in the exact right position or they won't charge at all. Clear plastic guides do just that with this charger; so there has always been a clean connect.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Works but the lights are BRIGHT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it is supposed to do. The controllers fit perfectly and charge in about 3 and half hours when totally drained. The only thing I'm not a fan is the blue light NEVER go off. The description says "Dual colored LED light indicator showing charge status" but doesn't mention that the blue light is bright as the sun. LOL If you need a night light in your setup this is the product for you but if you want the light to go off after charging... pick a different charger.
customer_reviews.author: G. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Works great, Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Loose wires and dead controllers are eliminated with this wonderful product. Sits nicely on the TV stand, and an LED lets you know the charging status.
customer_reviews.author: Mojave Narrows

customer_reviews.title: Decent design
customer_reviews.text: All in all, the holders for the controllers are VERY well built! However, the charging port couldn't withstand a toddler pulling from back of TV. I will say though, the controllers broke free and no damage was done to the charging adapter stand. I ended up taking the device apart and removing the charge port and wiring direct. For the manufacturer, look into a different charging port...the mini-B has always been flawed from the insert of the female end always falling out and getting lodged into the cable (which this was exactly what happened) Btw, don't skimp on screws...noticed the bottom plate only had two.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper Etiquette

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect!! It is light and sturdy. It recharges the controllers while the system is on standby and when it is on. For some reason it does not charge while the PS4 is off, but I do not mind. I haven't tried to connect it to the wall socket. Currently it is connected to the PS4.
customer_reviews.author: Black

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best investements ever. We are just lazy and don't want to get up to charge the remote when we are watching netflix. We added it to the nightstand and this way we always know where the remotes are and we always know that they will be charged. I was a bit concerned that the light would be too bright at night but it actually is not at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Macias

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product. Seems solid and well built
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Seems solid and well built. Not to hard To use and a nonslip base. Sometimes it's a little tricky to align the micro USB port to the controller, but I have gotten used to it so piece of cake. Indicator lights tell you whe. Your controller is fully charved. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Hmort

customer_reviews.title: We like having the charging port because it's aesthetically pleasing and ...
customer_reviews.text: We've had this charging port for about 9 months. We like having the charging port because it's aesthetically pleasing and charges fast. It's also nice to have dual charging ports. Just having it looks cleaner and less cluttered with no charging chords hanging out. However, after using it for a while, we have to wiggle the controller a little to get the charger to start charging when it's on the port. And it's not super easy to connect the charger to the controller since you have to make sure you find and plug the micro USB in all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Helgacakes

customer_reviews.title: Bright blue...
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent controller charger. We can charge it at night and the charge lasts most of the next day. It's pretty easy to connect the chargers but I would recommend an adult do the connect - just to make sure the kiddies don't break the connector. It glows red when the drained controllers are plugged in and turns blue once they are ready for play. It's a really bright blue light so I had to remove it from the bedroom. It looks good, not too bulky. I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: SSellers

customer_reviews.title: PS4 controller charger stand
customer_reviews.text: We have a few controllers in the house and so I bought this to help charge them. It is ok. The quality of the stand is durable and strong. The only thing I don’t like is when I put the controllers on to charge, it doesn’t seem to stay on. Only reason I know it’s not charged right is when I go to use one after it’s been on this charger for a day, there is no juice on the controller still. I plan on returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Sookie

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Honest reviewer here. People complain that the controllers are hard to dock and that this docking station is cheaply built. For the price, you can't complain about it being cheaply built. Personally, I don't think it's the strongest built thing in the world, but it works great and it holds the controllers. That's all you can really ask for, right? I have only had trouble docking a controller once since I got it 2 weeks ago, and we use our controllers daily. If you take a couple seconds, it's a breeze to plug in the controller. I'm very happy with this dock, and would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: but for the price its not bad at
customer_reviews.text: Its ok, it does the trick and definitely charges the controllers up. My only issue, and its not a big deal......but the blue lights are on all the time. I was kind of hoping the lights would be on when it was charging and be off when the controllers were fully charged or the stand was empty, but unfortunately that is not the case. I would give it 5 stars if the lights wouldn't be on all the time, but for the price its not bad at all
customer_reviews.author: JoshM5683

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the one made for PS3
customer_reviews.text: Just like the title this thing stays lit up blue just from being powered on the the red charge indicating light is on the bottom back of the unit and it makes it difficult to see. That's pretty stupid if you ask me having to turn the unit upside down to see if your stuff is charged!. The old one would be completely lit up red while charging then green when fully charged. Much easier. I wish they never changed the connector so I didn't have to buy another charger.
customer_reviews.author: S.D.Willie

customer_reviews.title: 50/50 if you charge your controller it might stick inside to your controller 50/50
customer_reviews.text: Not a good item the top broke off inside my controller like come on now not only the charger for the top Broke My Controller broke because I can't charge it! I don't know maybe I'm the only one but I have bad luck with this item and I didn't like it the top broke the bottom one still works but I just gave up after the whole controller incident so I just bought a regular charging cable.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro flores

customer_reviews.title: Must have for your PS4.
customer_reviews.text: So my husband had me ordering new charging cables weekly(in excess of 50$ worth after a month) when I'd had enough and bought this. I just toss the controllers on before bed and my kids haven't messed up anymore cords or lost any since this purchase! If this breaks I will just be buying another 1 of these.
customer_reviews.author: Just Sam

customer_reviews.title: Charges the controllers without over charging
customer_reviews.text: I was worried before purchasing that this device would not stop charging when the controllers were fully charge, which would degrade the controller's battery capacity over time. It does however seem to be stopping the charge when the controller is full. The charging light changes from red to a bright blue when it's done. The controllers fit snug and this device does what I need it to do. I would have liked a micro usb cable and a wall adapter included in the package as well, hence the 4 out of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Almost caught fire!
customer_reviews.text: Pain in the butt to get controller attached in order to charge. Had this product for about a year and my son just went to plug a PS4 controller into it when it started to smoke and melt the back of the controller. We are now down a controller and charger.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: You should probably look elsewhere...
customer_reviews.text: This charger worked well for a couple of charges but then it started getting faulty. It would flash randomly from blue to red and back so we would pull them off and wait a minute to put them back (then it would stop flashing) but our controllers would still be dead when we pulled them off later despite being "charged". Now BOTH of our controllers are completely dead and wont take a charge from any type of USB charger. Also, I placed the order in the beginning of November and did not receive it until right before New Years Eve. It's a good thought, but a poor result.
customer_reviews.author: KLVK

customer_reviews.title: ugly light. poor charging. not all listed items included.
customer_reviews.text: No usb power converter included. in product features: "The charge dock plugs directly into the wall, leaving the USB ports on the for Sony's PS4 open and the console tangle free" LED lights are SUPER BRIGHT and very annoying, as they are on even when there is no ps4 controller in the slot. won't fully charge controller.
customer_reviews.author: The Rocketdyke.

customer_reviews.title: If you're replacing your USB charge cord, Don't Buy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because the original PS4 USB charge cable got trashed. Worked for about 2 days, then while charging both controllers, it disconnected both controllers (the dreaded flashing white light). Guess what you need to reconnect the controllers? A good quality USB charge cord. If you still have yours and are okay with periodically having to sync your controllers back up, it's alright. Looks nice on the shelf. Don't buy if you're looking to replace your cord.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't charge well
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically this is a very neat item. However, I purchased it less than two weeks ago and I am already having trouble with it. The cord that connects the charger to the PS4 doesn't work well. I have to place a heavier item on it to keep it in place. Something you would expect with a charger that has been through the ringer and has had heavy usage. Not for something that you barely use. So I'm a bit disappointed with this item. Would I buy it again? Doubtful after this mishap.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer P.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a few months.
customer_reviews.text: This product was great for a few months. It allowed me to charge 2 controllers at once but after using it for about 5 months the connector that you attach the controller to broke off. Now I have a dual controller holder that only charges 1 controller.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Butler

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Visually pleasing to the eye
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Visually pleasing to the eye, keeps the controllers wrangled and charged, and seems to quick charge them too. Really cleaned up the entertainment center. Initially wished the light was blue instead of green, but honestly it is not glaringly obvious. Lights are easy to find and distinguish without drawing the eye to it if it’s not searching it out. Great item!
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This charging station is AWESOME! The controllers fit in perfectly and charged relatively quickly. Works very well!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: so far so good!
customer_reviews.text: so far it works great! the reason I only gave it 4 stars is because it only comes with a usb to mini usb adaptor cable so when you plug it into the PS4 itself it quits charging after powering down the system, if you plug it into a wall outlet it would be fine but they dont provide you with the plug for the usb cable.
customer_reviews.author: B. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I’m really surprised by all the good reviews. I bought it based on those. However, we used it for about two weeks before the charging jack dislodged from its soldering spot and was pushed into the base of the dock. It is pretty cheaply made. I was able to disassemble it with only a multi-tool. I’m really disappointed this barely held up.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A. McDonnell

customer_reviews.title: Long term this might be better so you don't constantly connect and disconnect from the ...
customer_reviews.text: Not the biggest fan, you have to have something attached to your controller. Long term this might be better so you don't constantly connect and disconnect from the miniusb. Was originally going to give it a 3 till I came up with the last line of the first paragraph. Pros and cons people, pros and cons.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: While it feels a little flimsy and I wonder about its long-term durability, we've had no problems with a month of use and it's been super nice to have fully-charged controllers whenever my husband and I sit down to play. I'll update if it does't last, but so far we're very happy!
customer_reviews.author: dreamyraynbo

customer_reviews.title: nice product and delivery was fast.
customer_reviews.text: Compact design looks and works as described. It also holds the controllers a lot more firm than I expected which is a huge plus.
customer_reviews.author: That I.T. Guy

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good idea the stand doesn’t hold the weight of both controllers super well it falls easily when it has 2 but that is my only issue and really it’s not even an issue it’s just a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal coulter

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but not a great design for functionality
customer_reviews.text: Liked the concept but attaching the controller to the charging stand is a delicate process. Quality is somewhat cheap which makes it feel very fragile as you try to insert the controller onto the port to attach. Once attached, it didn't feel stable at all. One of the charging ports was broken and the item was not very durable so the item was returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon fan

customer_reviews.title: Good charger, but lights are too bright
customer_reviews.text: Charger works just fine! I didn't realize it doesn't include an AC adapter, so I instead plugged it into the USB port on my Energizer PS3 controller charger. However, I took a star off because the blue LED lights are always on and are freakishly bright! I'll probably add a resistor to dim them down, but for now, I unplug the charger at night so that I can sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Feels a little cheap, but does the job while looking good. I absolutely prefer using this dock stand rather than having to use the USB cable to charge my controllers when I'm not using them. It's super easy to just swap the controllers in and out as they run out of juice. Just be sure to not have them in a room you sleep in as sometimes they flash and the lights are quite bright
customer_reviews.author: Judgement0s

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Works well for what is needed. We keep it next to the system and rotate controllers out to use if one dies. Looks clean better then having to look for cords! Have had it for a while and it has not broke.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Charging station was shipped and arrived on time. And charging station not only charges my controllers great the station looks awesome with the led lights. Very pleased with the charging station and seller is awesome as well. Would buy from them in the future. 5 stars ain't enough rate product and sell 10+. Would recommend buying this charging station to all gamers
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift and the person who received this really likes it! Works great. Very useful. The glowing color makes a neat accent light at night, too.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper1

customer_reviews.title: Small footprint and looks really nice with the lights
customer_reviews.text: Small footprint and looks really nice with the lights. It feels very delicate though and I'm afraid to break it. I don't let the kids put the chargers in the dock for this reason. The charging lights look nice, the the lower light always appears to display red and green at the same time. It charges just fine without issue, I just don't rely on the indicator light to determine charged status.
customer_reviews.author: James Morris

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't dual charge - disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I can't say I'm very happy with this. It only charges one port at a time, which kind of defeats the purpose of having a dual cradle. Also, it randomly chooses which port to charge, which is also not useful.
customer_reviews.author: JJTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Third charger we've bought in little over a year. Cats ate the cord on the first one, second one was cheap and now we're on this item. Kinda big and takes up more space than I'd like. The lights are random, they come on when they feel like it I guess. Charging is red, charged is blue, but sometimes they turn off, even when the PS4 is on. Seems like a quick charge though, which is good.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona Spruill

customer_reviews.title: Worthless waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Piece of garbage. The top stopped charging after a few weeks. Two months later and the bottom went too. I highly suggest that you do not buy this product. Wish I could go back in time and save my money.
customer_reviews.author: Silent Stocker

customer_reviews.title: Was working great until the charging USB that connects to the controller ...
customer_reviews.text: Was working great until the charging USB that connects to the controller broke. This is a great idea but isn't built very well and the connection that holds the USB charging is flimsy. It also does not charge the controller unless your PS4 is on or in rest mode. I was hoping it would've lasted a lot longer so I am pretty disappointed in the product
customer_reviews.author: Leonard

customer_reviews.title: It was pretty awesome, until it wasn't.
customer_reviews.text: My son and I had used this for a number of months. It did it's job. One of the controller saddle/holster didn't line up super well, but it did it's job Then one day, it didn't. It wasn't moved around a lot. Rarely, I would say. I don't know if the cable had ever been removed from the port after being inserted. But, the port dettached from the board. And I don't have a soldering iron that percise. I might be tempted to buy this again. It's likely that different sellers/manufactures are using the same pieces. Oh, well.
customer_reviews.author: mark fields

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong
customer_reviews.text: Got this charger years ago, never had a problem. Even when I haven't used the PS4 in awhile and my controllers have been sitting on the charger for a few months, they still work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Great Charging Station for the $$!
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best accessory I have ever bought for a console to date. For just $20 it charges your controllers pretty quickly. I haven’t timed it but it’s usually an hour or so if your controller is on zero bars of power. One thing to keep in mind is this station is on a shared circuit so if you charge two at once they only get half the current. I only charge mine one at a time but this could potentially annoy some people. It also lights up green when it’s fully charged. Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Scratched my controller when I inserted it.
customer_reviews.text: BE CAREFUL!! This controller charger for ps4 works, but it will scratch the center of the controller pretty bad after you inserter it. I bought the ps4 pro 500 million and when I inserted my new controller it came out scratched. I was not happy at all, but what I can do? Just want the future buyer to know this before they buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A Espinal

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that it would make noise or not charge properly, but it works great and doesn’t squeal at all. Looks great next to my PS4!
customer_reviews.author: luvtoread

customer_reviews.title: Same Product As Pictured
customer_reviews.text: It is exact what is pictured, but keep in mind that it isn't cordless. The light is always blue. It does not change colors. The product works perfectly and I've had it for about half a year now. You have to plug the controllers in a certain way so they'll fit, but it isn't difficult and you get used to that very quickly. Overall, I like it a lot, and I think that it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like it, but design may cause charging tips to break of easily
customer_reviews.text: Love how it looks and lights up. Kinda wish the cable was longer, so it’s not in the way of the screen (my PS4 is right next to the Tv). Twice now, I’ve had issues when trying to connect and charge my controllers. At one point, I thought the little charger tip had snapped when I tried to slide in the controller. Don’t feel confident about it’s durability now
customer_reviews.author: Frank S

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice sitting next to the ps4 and the other electronics ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, though it's sometimes hard to get the controllers onto the charger. It looks nice sitting next to the ps4 and the other electronics I have, and doesn't take up a lot of space. I am pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KatWy7172

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Been using a few months and still works great. You do have to line the remotes up just right to attach to the charger so, my son cannot do it himself. Only negative.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Charges 50% of the time
customer_reviews.text: Very unreliable charger. It hardly ever fully charges my controllers and often doesn't charge them at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Would give it a 5 star but it can be difficult at times inserting the PS4 controllers into the charger slot.
customer_reviews.author: Hosea

customer_reviews.title: Great charger, little bright.
customer_reviews.text: Works a dream, charged my controller from dead to full in about an hour, hour and a half. My only issue with it: the lights are too bright for me, so I have to unplug it when it's done charging. I'd like to have an option or setting to dim it down, but if it's in a living room somewhere, it probably wouldn't stick out so bad to my light-sensitive eyes. Putting it together is pretty straightforward. Just snap the base onto the tower. Plug to the wall is a mini-USB port (PS3 charging cable), the cord they give you isn't very long but it's easy to find longer cords because of. All in all, nicely designed product.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Miller

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: For some inexplicable reason, it just stopped working. The lights still come on when a controller is connected but they dont' charge
customer_reviews.author: Trang Ta (Sushie)

product_meta.title: PS4 Controller Charger, Megadream Playstation 4 Charging Station for Sony PS4 / PS4 Pro / PS4 Slim DualShock 4 Controller, Dual USB Fast Charging Station Stand & LED Indicator Light
feature_bullets: FAST CHARGING STATION - With 2 built-in micro USB adapter ports, Allows you to charge up your PS4 / PS4 Pro / PS4 Slim Controllers simultaneously. One controller just needs 2.5 hours and 4 hours for two
SAFE - With built-in excellent smart protector chip, you’ll never get over charged /over heated /over current / over voltage / short circuit / over discharger your PS4 controllers.
SAVE PLACE - Ideal for saving your place to store your controllers in the charger when you're not playing
LED LIGHT INDICATOR -- Red light: Charging; Blue light: Fully Charged
If you have any problem with our product, just feel free to contact us, our friendly customer team will provide you best service and solution.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,004 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
